SCTX - Script Source:
SCN mwShrineTribunalScript

; Applied to the triolith.

short button
short QuestionState
short blessingcost

Begin OnActivate
	if(Player.GetFactionRank 0Temple < 0); player not in faction
		set blessingcost to 35
	elseif(Player.GetFactionRank 0Temple == 0)||(Player.GetFactionRank 0Temple == 1) ; layman or novice
		set blessingcost to 10
	elseif(Player.GetFactionRank 0Temple > 1)
		set blessingcost to 0
	endif		

	if Player.GetItemCount Gold001 < blessingcost
		MessageBox "You do not have enough gold to make a donation." "OK"
		Return
	endif

	if ( QuestionState == 0 )
		MessageBox "Would you like to make a donation of %.0f Drakes and receive a blessing?" blessingcost "Yes" "No"
		set QuestionState to 10
	endif

End


Begin GameMode

	if QuestionState == 0
		return
	endif

;Ask second question 
	if ( QuestionState == 10 )

		Set button to GetButtonPressed

		if ( button == 0 )
			MessageBox "What blessing do you ask for?"  "Cure Disease" "Cure Blight Disease" "Cure Poison" "Lady's Grace" "Soul of Sotha Sil" "Vivec's Mystery" "Almsivi Restoration"
			set QuestionState to 20
		elseif ( button == 1 )
			set QuestionState to 0
		endif

		Return

	endif

;perform cure or give message
	if ( QuestionState == 20 )

		Set button to GetButtonPressed


		if ( button == 0 )
			PreloadMagicEffect CUDI			
			Cast fbmwCureDiseaseOtherSpell Player
			Player.RemoveItem Gold001 blessingcost
			Set QuestionState to 0
		endif
		if ( button == 1 )
			PreloadMagicEffect CUDI			
			Cast fbmwbmCureBlightAltar Player
			Player.RemoveItem Gold001 blessingcost			
			Set QuestionState to 0
		endif

		if ( button == 2 )
			PreloadMagicEffect CUPA
			Cast fbmwCurePoisonOtherSpell Player
			Player.RemoveItem Gold001 blessingcost			
			Set QuestionState to 0
		endif

		if ( button == 3 )
			Cast 0ladyAsSgraceSshrine Player          ; Fortify Endurance 5
			Player.RemoveItem Gold001 blessingcost
			Set QuestionState to 0
		endif

		if ( button == 4 )
			Cast 0soulSofSsothaSsil Player              ; Fortify Magicka 5
			Player.RemoveItem Gold001 blessingcost
			Set QuestionState to 0
		endif

		if ( button == 5 )		
			Cast 0vivecAsSmystery Player                ; Fortify Luck 10
			Player.RemoveItem Gold001 blessingcost			
			Set QuestionState to 0
		endif

		if ( button == 6 )
			Cast 0AlmsiviSRestoration Player		       ; Restore all Attributes and Skills 100
			Player.RemoveItem Gold001 blessingcost		
			Set QuestionState to 0
		endif

	endif

End
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
